segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the two children over by the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That little boy is standing on a two-step stool, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can clearly see the "COOKIE JAR" label, and it's definitely full.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His balance looks incredibly unstable; the stool's legs are splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like it could tip backward at any second, and he could fall hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there, with her hand out, clearly expecting a share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their secret mission to grab those treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't he realize the danger he's in on that wobbly perch?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical how concentrated they are on these cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit annoyed that they're risking so much for a snack.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Surely, there's a safer way to get those treats than climbing so high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation makes me very nervous for their safety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene before there's an accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he brings the whole jar down?
segments.speaker: PAR
